fields.Title of Presentation: How digital technology helps solve mysteries in the humanities
fields.Description/Abstract: We know that engineers make many things in our daily lives from computers to power grids. They also do many humanitarian projects. There is another less known side: Digital Humanities – using computers and technology to help further the study of the humanities such as art, literature and history. Elisa shares stories of how she has used computers can be used to help further knowledge in history, literature and art. There is much more to this story than just building a webpage.
